WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I downloaded the 1.62 release in Linux and had a small problem with the CSV.php modules. PHPExcel tries to load csv.php but the modules in Reader/
and Writer/ are named CSV.php. This was easily fixed by 'cp CSV.php csv.php'. 
I noticed a dramatic decrease of memory usage. Unloading a very complex excel in vs 1.60 used about 500M, in 1.62 usage is about 80M :D

Comments.Message: Have you spelled it uppercase when creating the writer? Do you have some example code?

Hi, 
this is very embarrasing, but very much me. Do not even try to think, jump to conclusions and doing very stupid fixes for noexisting problems.
As I pointed out Linux is case sensitive so spelling with right casing is important.
Thank you very much for pointing at the problem, I do not want to send any code, it is embarrasing enough as it is.
Sorry for bothering you
No problem :-) It can happen to anybody. Succes!
